title: Potato Head Beach Club Afternoon (Half-day)
overview: Experience the iconic Potato Head Beach Club with its beachfront pool, creative cocktails, and artful architecture in Seminyak.

stops.description: Depart for Potato Head Beach Club.
Arrive and enjoy the pool, cocktails, and beachfront views.
Explore the club's unique design and art installations.

title: Potato Head Beach Club Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of poolside lounging, creative cuisine, and sunset at Potato Head Beach Club.

stops.description: Depart for Potato Head Beach Club.
Arrive and enjoy the pool, art, and club facilities.
Lunch with creative cuisine and ocean views.
Relax by the pool, explore art installations, or enjoy club amenities.
